SageTVPlugin.Name: sagex-api - SageTV API Extensions
SageTVPlugin.Description: SageTV API Wrappers with Remote API capabilities
SageTVPlugin.Author: stuckless
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
7.1.9.22 * Fixed /mediafile/ handler to handle http range headers * Added the ability to return .m3u8 video playlists from /mediafile/ handler
7.1.9.15 * Added Phoenix Streaming api handler to the list of media handlers
7.1.9.14 * Added Range Header support to the sagex/media/mediafile handler
7.1.9.12 * Added encoder=raw to allow the api to stream back a reply without json or xml formatting
7.1.9.10 * Fixed Map serialization error
7.1.9.9 * Minor changes in the REST api handling to support Phoenix REST services
7.1.9.3 * Changed 'call()' behaviour so that EvaluateExpression will allow the Exceptions to bubble up
7.1.9.2 * JSON/XML Serializers now will encode the error instead of allowing the webserver to send it back * Added Support for Phoenix Remote API
7.1.9.1 * Applied patches by slugger that fixes a couple of issues * Fixed bug where IsShowFirstRun was returning false
7.1.5.5 * Airings will now return channel information
7.1.5.4 * Changed Logging to use Rolling Appender with a Max size of 10mb * HTTP: Updated Logo APIs to use new Logos APIs * HTTP: Added Image Scaling to ALL Image APIs * HTTP: Ability to return Image data when requesting method that returns MetaImage
7.1.5.3 * Renamed some Show APIs since they are incorrect in the JavaDoc
7.1.5.2 * Another API refresh, since some APIs were apparently missing.
7.1.5.1 * Fixed bug in MediaHandler that prevented it from working in 7.0x in some cases (album art)
7.1.5 * Refreshed the APIs * Updated Event Constants to reflect new events in 7.1.5 * Added SeriesInfo lookups via json (ie, series:SeriesInfoID) * Added Favorite lookups vis json (ie, favorite:FavoriteID) * Added Plugin lookups vis json (ie, plugin:PluginID) * Added scaling processing to logos, albumart, and thumbnails
7.0.23.6 * Added serialization for SeriesInfo from skiingwiz
7.0.23.5 * Minor bug fixes in the Media Thumbnail Handler
7.0.23.3 * Fixed small bug in TypeUtils
7.0.23.2 * Deprecated legacy xml, json, and xbmc remote interfaces * Added RMI Reaper for cleaning up Remote RMI objects
7.0.11.0 * Added Validation Support (IPropertyValidator) * Fixed bug in the AbstractPlugin where null configuration values could never be set to a value.
